alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 2:55PM EST until January 03 at 3:30PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EST FOR CATOOSA...NORTH CENTRAL WHITFIELD...CENTRAL WALKER AND SOUTH CENTRAL DADE COUNTIES... At 254 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Varnell to Center Post, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ringgold, Fort Oglethorpe, Chickamauga, Varnell, Cohutta, Chattanooga Valley, La Fayette, Noble, Lakeview, Indian Springs, Graysville, Blue Spring, Fairview, Boynton, Beaumont, Chattanooga Valley, Cooper Heights, Rock Spring and Red Clay State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for northwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
